Nereah attributes her success to her friendly interaction with customers and additional finance from KMET. She has applied for $600.00 to further expand her business by increasing stock of new and second-hand clothes.

Disclaimer: Due to recent events in Kenya, the security situation in many communities remains unsettled, affecting many local businesses. Lenders to this entrepreneur should be aware that this loan may represent a higher default risk, and should be willing to accept this additional risk in making their loan.

loans.use: To buy additional stock of used and ready made clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase clothing in bulk for her small business.

loans.name: Gulraftor.

texts.ru:
Gulraftor S. lives in the Shahrinav region. She is 35 years old, married, with two children. She has a post-secondary education, and is a lawyer by trade. Gulraftor buys and sells household cleaning products. She has seven years of experience in the field. This activity brings in most of the family income, since her husband works in construction, and this kind of job is seasonal only. At the moment, the client wishes to purchase goods from wholesale suppliers. For this she needs funding. She decided to take out a loan with MLF HUMO. Gulraftor plans to repay the loan in twelve months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Ezhevskaya, Kiva volunteer.

Сафарова Гулрафтор жительница района Шахринав.Возраст 35 лет, замужем, имеет 2 детей. Образование высшее, по специальности юрист. Гулрафтор занимается куплей продажей бытовой химии.Имеет опыт в этой сфере более 7 лет. Эта деятельность приносит основной доход ее семье. Так как муж клиентки работает строителем и работа у него сезонная.В данный момент клиентка хочет закупить товар у оптовых поставщиков. Для чего ей нужны деньги. Она решила взять кредит в МЗФ ХУМО. Гулрафтор планирует погасить кредит в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Diversifying the line of products

loans.name: Lola

texts.ru:
Lola T. lives in the Tursun-zade area. She is 36 years old, completed her secondary education, is married, and has one child. Lola has a small stall in the local Tursun-zade city market, where she sells retail goods that she bought wholesale. Her business provides the primary source of income for the family. In total she has more than 17 years of experience in business. She would like to expand the variety of goods at her stall by adding new items. That requires monetary resources, so she decided to take out a loan, to be paid back over 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer.

Тошматова Лола Хамзаевна жительница района Турсунзаде.Возраст 36 лет, замужем ,имеет 1 ребенка.Образование среднее.Лола имеет небольшую торговую точку на местном рынке города Турсунзде, где торгует . Имеет опыт в бизнесе более 17 лет. Бизнес является основным источником дохода ее семьи. Она закупаету оптовых поставщиков товар и реализует в розницу. Клиентка хочет пополнить ассортимент торговой точки свежим товаром.Для чего ей необходимы денежные средства.Поэтому она решила взять кредит сроком на 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Expanding range of products at market stall

loans.name: Zulfiya.

texts.ru:
Zulfiya U. lives in the city of Vahdat. She is 58 years old, married, and has 6 children. She completed secondary education. Zulfiya has raised animals since she was young. Currently the family has one dairy cow with a calf, but still not enough dairy products for the family. Buying an additional cow isn’t possible with the family’s tight financial situation, and at the market milk is expensive. Yet the small children in her family need these dairy products. After talking with her family, Zulfiya decided to take out a loan to buy a dairy cow. The loan will be repaid in 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer.

Умарова Зульфия жительница города Вахдат. Возраст 58 лет,замужем , имеет 6 детей. Образование среднее. Клиентка с молодости занимается животноводством. В данный момент ее семья имеет одну дойную корову с теленком.Но кисло-молочной продукции ее семье не хватает.А покупать дополнительно ее семье не позволяет финансовое положение.На рынке молоко стоит дорого.А в семье клиентки есть маленькие дети ,которым необходимы эти продукты. Посоветовавшись с семьей Зульфия решила взять кредит для покупки дойной коровы.Планирует погасить кредит в течении 10 месяцев

loans.use: Purchase of a dairy cow

loans.name: Sharifgul

texts.ru:
Sharifgul K. lives in the Vahdat region. She is 52 years old, married, and has 8 children. She has raised animals and sold cultured milk products to other residents for over 8 years. Her neighbors know that they can always buy fresh milk products from her. Demand for her goods has been growing, so she decided to buy another dairy cow. Since she doesn’t have enough money of her own to buy one, she decided to take out a loan with a 10-month pay back period.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer.

Камолова Шарифгул Каримовна жительница района Вахдат .Возраст 52 года, замужем , имеет 8 детей. Шарифгул более 8 лет зани мается животноводствои и продажей кисло молочной продукцией населению. Соседи клиентки знают,что всегда могут приобрести у нее свежую продукцию.Так как в данное время возрос спрос на ее продукцию,клиентка решила приобрести дойную корову .Но своих денег у нее нет .Она решила взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев

loans.use: Purchase of a dairy cow

loans.name: Burigul

texts.ru:
Burigul H. lives in the Vahdat region. She is 47 years old, married, and has 8 children. She has completed secondary education. Burigul has been practicing animal husbandry for over 10 years. She buys young bull calves at the market, raises them for 45 days, and then sells them at the market for a profit. This provides supplementary income for her large family. Her husband works, but has a very small salary which is not enough to support the family. Burigul wants to buy three bull calves and feed, but she does not have the financial resources to do so. That is why she decided to take out a loan, to be paid back in 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer.

Холова Буригул жительница района Вахдат .Возраст 47 лет, замужем , имеет 8 детей.Образование среднее. Буригул более 10 лет занимается животноводством. Она покупает на рынке молодых бычков, откармливает их в течение 45 дней .После чего продает на рынке по выгодной ей цене. Эта деятельность явялется дополнительным источником дохода ее большой семьи. Муж клиентки работает, но заработная плата очень маленькая и ее не хватает для содержаниии семьи. Буригул хочет купить 3 бычков и корм.Но денежных средств у нее нет .Поэтому она решила взять кредит сроком на 10 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase of three bull calves and feed

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
The elegance of each of her beautiful traditional skirts are glittering in Sra. Hilda’s store who for 10 years has dedicated herself to selling and renting traditional skirts. She also tailors beautiful and innovative clothing that are shown at her store. Her store is frequently visited and many “cholitas” order their colorful traditional skirts for special occasions or simply to look more beautiful from Hilda. Hilda feels very happy because she never imagined that this business that she began with little expectations would convert itself into her main source of income. Now that she has experience in this activity she hopes to expand it and is thus requesting a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Eliza Wethey, Kiva volunteer.

La elegancia de cada uno de sus hermosas polleras y centros de vestir son muy relucientes en la tienda de doña Hilda, quien desde hace 10 años viene dedicándose a la venta y alquiler de polleras y adicionalmente a este negocio confecciona hermosos y novedosos centros que son exhibidos en su local.Su tiendita es muy visitada y solicitada por aquellas hermosas cholitas que adquieren sus coloridas polleras para fechas especiales o simplemente para lucir más bellas, Hilda se siente muy contenta por que jamás imagino que ese negocio que inicio con poca expectativa se convertiría en su principal fuente de ingreso económico.Ahora que ya tiene experiencia en ésta actividad desea ampliarla y es por ello que solicita un préstamo.

loans.use: Increase her capital in order to expand her work space.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy is a member of the Dos Mil (2000) Communal Bank (first loan: www.kiva.org/app.php?page=businesses&action=about&id=28090&_tpos=2&_tpg=1). She is a 35-year-old single mother of one daughter. She runs a general store out of her parents' home where she sells groceries and snacks. She started out selling very few products but little by little has been stocking it with more items and now has more clients. Nancy is requesting a loan of 1400 soles ($500), which she will use to purchase rice, sugar, milk, oil, flour and noodles. Her dreams are to have her own home, enlarge her business and provide her daugther with a good education.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

Primer préstamo: http://www.kiva.org/app.php?page=businesses&action=about&id=28090&_tpos=2&_tpg=1

Nancy es socia del Banco Comunal Dos Mil.

Nancy es madre soltera, tiene 35 años y 1 hija, Nancy tiene una tienda donde vende abarrotes, golosinas, esta ubicado en la casa de sus padres. Inicialmente vendía muy pocos productos y poco a poco fue surtiendo con mas productos y actualmente tiene mas clientes.

Nancy necesita un préstamo de 1400 soles, dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, harina y fideo.

Los sueños de Nancy son tener casa propia, ampliar su negocio y brindar una buena educación a su hija.

loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar, milk, oil, flour and noodles / Nancy necesita un préstamo de 1400 soles, dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, harina y fideo.
